title: Urgot rework
body:
Urgot seems a bit lackluster when it comes to playing him, and he reminds me of the old sion before his rework. So I was thinking about how I would rework Urgot.

passive: enemy champions moving closer and toward Urgot have reduced movespeed
Q: unchanged
W: unchanged except enemy champions who deal damage to Urgot while his shield is active recieve the targeting from his Q
E: removed the armor reduction and added his old passive of damage reduction

R: unchanged

I believe this build will reward good positioning and has the potential to produce strategic gameplay with urgot. 

I dont know, but i would like to hear other views on this.

Narul
